definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">No additional trigger</field><next><block type="controls_if"><mutation elseif="1" else="1"/><value name="IF0"><block type="text_binary_ops"><value name="A"><block type="get_command_parameters"><field name="paramid">0</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">true</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="variables_set_logic"><field name="VAR">global:TriggerONAnnouncement</field><value name="VAL"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">TRUE</field></block></value></block></statement><value name="IF1"><block type="text_binary_ops"><value name="A"><block type="get_command_parameters"><field name="paramid">0</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">false</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO1"><block type="variables_set_logic"><field name="VAR">global:TriggerONAnnouncement</field><value name="VAL"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">FALSE</field></block></value></block></statement><statement name="ELSE"><block type="entity_send_chat"><value name="text"><block type="text_join"><mutation items="2"/><value name="ADD0"><block type="get_command_parameters"><field name="paramid">0</field></block></value><value name="ADD1"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">is an invalid option please use either true or false</field></block></value></block></value><value name="actbar"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">FALSE</field></block></value></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
